summary: This bill, the Support Water-Efficient Strategies and Technologies Act of 2025, amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to promote water conservation and drought resilience in agriculture. It increases payments for water-saving practices, defines and supports perennial production systems for resource-conserving management, and establishes payment limitations. The bill also directs the Secretary to enhance soil health through outreach and soil health testing. The primary focus is on incentivizing practices that conserve water and improve agricultural sustainability.
